_header: For hunger greedy I thee to feeden
_description: The practical works of mercy — seven long lines with internal rhyme, or seven couplets of which two lines written as one in MS

Bod841.First Lines:
for honger gredy the to feden lo me redyfor Thrist I clene haue
                    dringe for god þat I lene…
Bod841.Last Lines:
…Me wrong men wyten take a peny til god wil the …This
                    man I graue for ioye mede to haue
